basics.name: David Haskins
basics.label: Learning & Performance
basics.summary: Confident, dedicated, bilingual learning and performance professional with over 20 years experience. Proven track record in planning and prioritizing efficiently, and meeting deadlines. Experience in instructional design, e-learning courseware design/development, performance consulting, training, and performance support. Strengths include interpersonal skills, communications, creativity, and initiative. Proficient with MS Office, the Adobe E-learning Suite (Captivate, Presenter, Photoshop, Audition), WebEx, WordPress, learning management systems.

Delivered both in-class and online training to support adoption of a new Customer Relationship Management system
Created learning content for use in Technology-Based Training (TBT)
Analyzed, designed, and developed instructional strategies for TBT projects
Performed and produced Training Needs Analysis Reports for multiple $500,000 projects
Designed and developed interactive e-learning courseware
